name: Monte del Diablo
description:
THIS IS A PREVIEW BUILD - STILL WORKING IN THE FINAL 7DRL VERSION :)

A traditional roguelike where you have to beat the devil. You are a countryman, a coffee farmer living in the mountains of Colombia, but fate has it for you to seek revenge. 

Visit the towns in the valley of Oporapa, and prepare for your showdown in the Farashon hills, where you will find caves inhabited by many Colombian myths and legends.

Credits (to be completed)

  • Illustrations by Laura Rubio (inkiluanna/hey luanna)
  • Pixel art by h2oHervida
  • Audio by Juan Carlos García / QuietGecko
  • Music by Camilo Fique
  • Design and Content by Esteban Martinez / Stoltverd
  • Design and Coding by Santiago Zapata / slashie
